user_question: What are some of the most unusual inventions in history, and can you generate an image of one of them?
final_answer: Some unusual inventions include the cat piano, the baby cage, and the anti-pervert hair leg stockings. Image of the cat piano generated. The cat piano was a conceptual musical instrument where cats were placed in a row with their tails stretched under a keyboard. When a key was pressed, it would strike the tail of a cat, causing it to meow at a specific pitch.
